faq.title: Have any questions? Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Focus on your business and let APS handle it for you. You have a business to run. Stop worrying about flaws and let us take care of you

list1.question: What is the APSX Platform program?
list1.answer: It is a clinic management system that helps you manage your clinic conveniently, quickly, and with maximum efficiency. The system is user-friendly, comprehensive, and accessible on all devices, anytime, anywhere via the internet. Suitable for hospitals, clinics, spas, wellness centers, senior care centers, beauty businesses, specialized clinics, general clinics, maternity clinics, physiotherapy clinics, Thai-Chinese medicine clinics, general medicine clinics, mother and child clinics, drug rehabilitation clinics, mental health clinics, and eye clinics.

list2.question: What is a cloud system?
list2.answer: Cloud Computing is the use of software, systems, and computer resources provided by service providers via the internet. Therefore, there is no need to install any programs, and it can be used on any device with a web browser installed. Typically, user data is stored on large server networks that are monitored 24/7 and have high security, reducing the risk of data loss due to computer failure or virus attacks.

list3.question: Can the system be used on Macbook, iMac, Notebook, PC, and Linux operating systems?
list3.answer: The system can work with Macbook, iMac, Notebook, PC, and Linux operating systems. Simply install Google Chrome on your device, and you can use it.

list4.question: How can I update the system to use new functions? Do I need to install additional programs?
list4.answer: Whenever new functions are updated, the system will automatically update them. Users can start using these new functions immediately without any time or cost. The list of new function updates will be displayed on the system's main screen.

list5.question: If I have questions about using the program, where can I ask?
list5.answer: You can ask additional questions about usage via LINE: @apsth or watch usage tutorial videos.

list6.question: Is there training for using the program?
list6.answer: APSTH provides one training session for your clinic via remote access. If additional training is needed, please contact us to schedule an appointment with the team at no additional cost. If you require on-site training at the clinic, the clinic will need to cover travel and accommodation expenses for multi-day training.

list7.question: How long does it take to install the APSTH Clinic system?
list7.answer: Installation takes a short time. After the customer confirms payment with the staff and provides clinic information, the system will be ready for use within 20 minutes.
